title: All Ball - Doug and Oregon St. Asst. Gregg Gottlieb Discuss 'The Last Dance' Inside Look At MJ's Leadership Style, Flu Game, Game 7
itunes:title: All Ball - Doug and Oregon St. Asst. Gregg Gottlieb Discuss 'The Last Dance' Inside Look At MJ's Leadership Style, Flu Game, Game 7
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by his older brother - and Oregon State Assistant Coach - Gregg Gottlieb to discuss their impressions from The Last Dance as it heads into the final episodes, including the first unfiltered look at MJ's leadership style, and look head to 'The Flu Game' and 'The Shot' against the Jazz in the finale. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
